data.content:
Aphelios (Default)

Cost: N/A | Release Date: N/A

Aphelios, the Weapon of the Faithful, is a unique and enigmatic champion in the popular online game League of Legends. As a marksman, Aphelios wields an arsenal of five different weapons, each with its own abilities and effects. While his default skin may not have any flashy visual changes, it is the embodiment of his true essence and story.

The default skin of Aphelios represents his original appearance when he was first introduced to the game. It showcases his mysterious and otherworldly nature, with his pale complexion, silver hair, and piercing blue eyes. He wears a dark, flowing robe adorned with intricate symbols and patterns, reflecting his connection to the Lunari, a religious order dedicated to the moon.

Aphelios carries his five weapons, collectively known as the Moonstone Arsenal, which are seamlessly integrated into his character model. These weapons include a sniper rifle (Calibrum), a flamethrower (Severum), a boomerang-like blade (Gravitum), a chakram (Infernum), and a scythe (Crescendum). Each weapon represents a different aspect of his kit, allowing him to adapt to various situations and playstyles.

The lore behind Aphelios is shrouded in mystery, adding to his allure. Born into the Lunari faith, Aphelios and his twin sister Alune were chosen to become the weapons of the faith. However, tragedy struck when the Solari, a rival religious order, attacked their temple, resulting in the death of their parents. Alune sacrificed herself to save Aphelios, and her spirit now guides him in battle, communicating through a telepathic connection.

Aphelios possesses a unique gameplay mechanic that sets him apart from other champions. Instead of having traditional abilities, he relies on his weapons and the phases of the moon to dictate his actions. Each weapon has a limited number of shots before it is replaced by the next in the cycle, and Aphelios must strategically manage his arsenal to maximize his effectiveness in combat.

In terms of strengths, Aphelios excels at dealing sustained damage from a safe distance. His sniper rifle (Calibrum) allows him to poke enemies from afar, while his flamethrower (Severum) provides sustain through life steal. His chakram (Infernum) can devastate multiple enemies at once, and his scythe (Crescendum) excels in close-quarters combat. With proper weapon rotations and positioning, Aphelios can be a formidable force on the battlefield.

However, Aphelios also has weaknesses that players must be mindful of. He lacks mobility and is vulnerable to assassins and champions with high burst damage. Additionally, his reliance on his weapons' limited ammo can leave him defenseless if not managed properly. Aphelios requires careful planning and coordination to fully utilize his kit and overcome these weaknesses.

In the world of League of Legends, Aphelios is a champion with a rich backstory and a unique playstyle. His connection to the Lunari and his tragic past make him a compelling character to explore. Whether you're a fan of his lore or enjoy his intricate gameplay mechanics, Aphelios offers a fresh and challenging experience for players.

On this page, you can find information and videos about all the appearances of Aphelios, including his various skins and their release dates. Explore the different facets of this enigmatic champion and uncover the secrets of the Weapon of the Faithful.

Aphelios (EDG Aphelios)

RP Cost: Unknown

Release Date: Unknown

Aphelios, the Weapon of the Faithful, is a champion in the popular online game League of Legends. Known for his unique gameplay mechanics and mysterious lore, Aphelios has captured the hearts of players around the world. With the release of the EDG Aphelios skin, players can now experience a new look for this enigmatic champion.

The EDG Aphelios skin is a collaboration between Riot Games and the professional esports organization EDward Gaming (EDG). This skin pays homage to EDG, featuring their iconic black and white color scheme and incorporating their logo into Aphelios' design. The skin transforms Aphelios into a formidable warrior, ready to represent EDG on the Summoner's Rift.

As with all skins in League of Legends, the EDG Aphelios skin offers a complete visual overhaul for the champion. Aphelios' base appearance is replaced with a new model, featuring EDG-themed armor and weaponry. The skin also includes new visual effects for his abilities, making them even more impressive and visually striking.

One of the most exciting aspects of the EDG Aphelios skin is the inclusion of unique voice lines. Aphelios' voice actor delivers new lines specific to the skin, further immersing players in the EDG experience. These voice lines add an extra layer of personality and depth to the champion, making the skin feel truly special.

Now, let's delve into the story of Aphelios and his place in the world of League of Legends. Aphelios hails from the Lunari, a secretive and ancient religious order. He is one of the last remaining members of his tribe, tasked with protecting the faith and wielding the sacred weapons of the Lunari.

What sets Aphelios apart from other champions is his unique gameplay mechanics. Instead of traditional abilities, Aphelios wields five different weapons, each with its own set of abilities. These weapons are governed by the cycle of the moon, and Aphelios must carefully manage his arsenal to maximize his effectiveness in battle.

Aphelios' strengths lie in his versatility and adaptability. With access to multiple weapons, he can adapt to different situations and engage in various playstyles. Whether it's long-range poke with his sniper rifle or close-quarters combat with his flamethrower, Aphelios has the tools to handle different scenarios.

However, Aphelios' complexity can also be seen as a weakness. Mastering his arsenal and understanding the optimal times to switch weapons requires practice and game knowledge. Additionally, Aphelios lacks mobility, making him vulnerable to champions with high mobility or crowd control abilities.

In the world of League of Legends, Aphelios' story is intertwined with that of his sister, Alune. Alune is a powerful seer who guides Aphelios through their telepathic connection. Together, they seek to restore the Lunari faith and protect their people from the encroaching darkness.

Aphelios' unique gameplay and intriguing lore have made him a popular pick among players. His high skill ceiling and strategic depth make him a rewarding champion to master. With the release of the EDG Aphelios skin, players can now showcase their support for both Aphelios and EDG on the battlefield.

On this page, you can find information and videos showcasing all of Aphelios' appearances, including the EDG Aphelios skin. Whether you're a fan of Aphelios' lore, gameplay, or simply want to explore his different looks, this page is your go-to resource for all things Aphelios.

Aphelios (Lunar Beast Aphelios)

RP Cost: 1350 RP

Release Date: February 4, 2021

League of Legends, the popular multiplayer online battle arena (MOBA) game developed by Riot Games, is known for its diverse roster of champions. One such champion is Aphelios, a mysterious marksman who wields an arsenal of moonstone weapons. With the release of the Lunar Beast Aphelios skin, players can now experience a new and exciting look for this enigmatic champion.

The Lunar Beast Aphelios skin, priced at 1350 RP, was introduced to the game on February 4, 2021. This skin is part of the Lunar Beast skin line, which celebrates the Lunar New Year with vibrant and thematic designs. With its unique visual effects and animations, the Lunar Beast Aphelios skin offers players a fresh and captivating experience while playing as this champion.

The Story of Lunar Beast Aphelios

In the world of League of Legends, Aphelios is a member of the Lunari, a religious order that worships the moon. He is a mute assassin who fights alongside his sister, Alune, using a combination of moonstone-infused weapons. The Lunar Beast Aphelios skin takes this lunar theme to the next level, transforming Aphelios into a fearsome warrior adorned in celestial armor.

The Lunar Beast Aphelios skin features a striking color palette dominated by shades of blue and silver. His armor is intricately designed, with lunar motifs and glowing accents that give him an otherworldly appearance. The skin also introduces new visual effects, such as lunar energy trails and moonlit explosions, which add a touch of magic to Aphelios' abilities.

Furthermore, the Lunar Beast Aphelios skin brings unique animations to the champion. His weapon transformations are accompanied by dazzling lunar effects, and his ultimate ability, Moonlight Vigil, unleashes a powerful lunar beam that leaves a trail of moon dust in its wake. These visual enhancements not only make the skin visually appealing but also enhance the gameplay experience for Aphelios players.

Aphelios: The Mute Assassin

Aphelios is a complex and intriguing champion in the League of Legends universe. Born into the Lunari faith, he and his sister Alune were chosen to become the weapons of the faith, wielding the power of the moon to protect their people. However, tragedy struck when the Solari, a rival religious order, attacked the Lunari, resulting in the death of many of Aphelios' kin.

As a result of the attack, Aphelios lost his ability to speak, but gained a unique connection with his sister. Alune now acts as his voice, guiding him through their shared bond. Together, they seek vengeance against the Solari and anyone who threatens the Lunari way of life.

In the game, Aphelios is known for his complex gameplay mechanics. Unlike other champions, he does not have traditional abilities. Instead, he wields five different moonstone weapons, each with its own unique effect. These weapons are controlled by a cycle, allowing Aphelios to switch between them during combat. This unique playstyle requires careful planning and coordination to maximize Aphelios' potential.

Aphelios' strengths lie in his ability to deal sustained damage from a safe distance. His weapons offer a variety of effects, including long-range poke, area-of-effect damage, and crowd control. With proper positioning and weapon management, Aphelios can dominate team fights and pick off enemies from afar.

However, Aphelios also has weaknesses that players must be aware of. His lack of mobility makes him vulnerable to assassins and champions with gap-closing abilities. Additionally, his reliance on weapon cycling means that he can be caught off guard if his weapons are not properly managed. Players must have a deep understanding of Aphelios' kit and playstyle to succeed with this champion.

Aphelios' Place in the Game

Aphelios was introduced to League of Legends in December 2019 and quickly became a popular pick among players. His unique mechanics and high skill ceiling make him a favorite among those who enjoy mastering complex champions. Aphelios' versatility and potential for outplay make him a valuable asset in both solo queue and professional play.

With the release of the Lunar Beast Aphelios skin, players now have the opportunity to showcase their skills with this champion in a visually stunning and thematically fitting way. Whether you're a fan of the Lunar New Year celebrations or simply appreciate the beauty of the skin, Lunar Beast Aphelios offers a fresh and exciting experience for players.

On this page, you can find information and videos about all the appearances of Aphelios, including the Lunar Beast Aphelios skin. Explore the different skins and discover the unique visual and gameplay elements that each one brings to this enigmatic champion. Whether you prefer the celestial beauty of the Lunar Beast Aphelios or the dark allure of Nightbringer Aphelios, there is a skin for every taste and playstyle.

Embrace the power of the moon and unleash your inner assassin with Aphelios and his Lunar Beast skin. Experience the thrill of wielding moonstone weapons and bring justice to those who threaten the Lunari. With his unique gameplay mechanics and captivating lore, Aphelios is a champion that will continue to captivate players for years to come.

Aphelios: The Weapon of the Faithful

Release Date: December 11, 2019

On the mystical world of Runeterra, where magic and ancient beings coexist, a new champion emerged to join the ranks of the League of Legends. Aphelios, the Weapon of the Faithful, made his debut on December 11, 2019, captivating players with his unique gameplay mechanics and intriguing lore.

The Story of Aphelios

Aphelios hails from the Targonian mountain peak known as Mount Targon, a place where celestial beings and mortals intertwine. Born into the Lunari, a reclusive and secretive religious order, Aphelios and his twin sister Alune were chosen by the moon itself to become the weapons of the faith. While Alune possesses the ability to communicate with the moon and guide her brother, Aphelios is a mute, relying on his sister's telepathic connection to understand the world around him.

As a member of the Lunari, Aphelios was trained in the art of combat and marksmanship, honing his skills to become an unparalleled assassin. However, his true power lies in his arsenal of five unique weapons, each representing a different aspect of the moon. These weapons are Alune's creations, forged from moonstone and imbued with celestial magic.

Each weapon grants Aphelios a distinct set of abilities, allowing him to adapt to various situations on the battlefield. The weapons are:

  • Calibrum: The Rifle - A long-range weapon that excels at poking enemies from a distance.
  • Severum: The Scythe Pistol - A weapon that grants Aphelios life steal and close-range sustain.
  • Gravitum: The Cannon - A weapon that slows enemies and sets them up for crowd control.
  • Infernum: The Flamethrower - A weapon that deals area-of-effect damage, perfect for team fights.
  • Crescendum: The Chakram - A weapon that excels at close-range combat and can be thrown as a boomerang.

What makes Aphelios truly unique is that he can only wield two weapons at a time, cycling through them as he uses his abilities. This requires careful planning and strategy, as each weapon has a limited number of attacks before it must be swapped out. Aphelios must also manage his ammo count, ensuring he has enough to utilize his abilities effectively.

Strengths and Weaknesses

Aphelios possesses a diverse set of strengths and weaknesses, making him a versatile champion in the right hands. His long-range poke with Calibrum allows him to harass enemies from a safe distance, while Severum provides sustain and survivability in close-quarters combat. Gravitum's crowd control potential can be devastating when combined with Aphelios' team, and Infernum's area-of-effect damage can decimate entire groups of enemies. Lastly, Crescendum's boomerang-like attacks make Aphelios a formidable duelist.

However, Aphelios also has his fair share of weaknesses. His reliance on his weapons and ammo management can leave him vulnerable if caught off-guard or forced into extended fights. Additionally, his lack of mobility makes him an easy target for assassins and champions with gap-closing abilities. Aphelios requires careful positioning and coordination with his team to maximize his potential.

Aphelios in the Game

Aphelios' arrival in the League of Legends brought a new level of complexity to the game. Mastering his unique mechanics requires a deep understanding of his weapons, their abilities, and the optimal times to switch between them. Aphelios players must carefully plan their engagements, utilizing the strengths of each weapon to outmaneuver and outplay their opponents.

With his intricate gameplay and captivating lore, Aphelios quickly became a fan-favorite among League of Legends players. His mysterious background and connection to the celestial realm add depth to the game's lore, enticing players to explore the world of Runeterra further.

On our website, you can find detailed information about Aphelios, including his abilities, lore, and gameplay tips. Additionally, we have compiled videos showcasing all of Aphelios' skins, allowing players to witness the stunning visual transformations of this enigmatic champion.

Join the ranks of the faithful and embrace the power of the moon with Aphelios, the Weapon of the Faithful!

Aphelios (Nightbringer Aphelios)

RP Cost: 1350 RP

Release Date: September 24, 2020

Aphelios, the enigmatic marksman of League of Legends, has received a stunning new skin called Nightbringer Aphelios. This skin, released on September 24, 2020, is a part of the Nightbringer skin line, which features champions who have embraced the darkness within them. Nightbringer Aphelios showcases a darker and more sinister side of this champion, with a visually striking appearance and thematic abilities that perfectly complement his mysterious nature.

As the name suggests, Nightbringer Aphelios is a manifestation of Aphelios' connection to the night and the power it holds. The skin features a black and gold color scheme, with intricate celestial patterns adorning his armor. His weapons, the Moonstone and the Gravitum, have been transformed into menacing dark versions, exuding an aura of malevolence. The skin also introduces new visual effects, animations, and sound effects, further enhancing the immersive experience of playing as Nightbringer Aphelios.

One of the most notable aspects of Nightbringer Aphelios is the unique way in which his abilities have been reimagined. Each of his five weapons now represents a different aspect of the night, allowing players to harness the power of darkness in various ways. The Calibrum, Severum, Gravitum, Infernum, and Crescendum weapons have all been given a dark twist, with new particle effects and animations that make them feel even more impactful.

Aphelios himself is a champion with a captivating backstory. Born under a cursed moon, he and his twin sister Alune were destined to be connected to each other. Alune, who is blind, sees through Aphelios' eyes and guides him in battle. Together, they form an unstoppable force, utilizing their unique abilities to bring down their enemies.

In terms of gameplay, Aphelios is a complex champion who requires careful planning and strategy. His kit revolves around his five weapons, each with its own set of abilities. Aphelios can cycle through these weapons, utilizing their strengths to adapt to different situations. This versatility allows him to excel in both short-range and long-range combat, making him a formidable force on the Rift.

However, Aphelios' complexity also makes him challenging to master. Players must learn to manage his weapon rotations effectively and make quick decisions based on the situation at hand. Additionally, his reliance on his sister Alune adds another layer of complexity to his gameplay, as players must coordinate their actions to maximize their effectiveness.

In the lore of League of Legends, Aphelios and Alune are part of the Lunari, a group of individuals who worship the moon and its power. They are locked in an eternal struggle against the Solari, who worship the sun. This conflict forms the backdrop for their story, as they fight to protect their beliefs and ensure the survival of their people.

Aphelios' unique playstyle and captivating lore have made him a popular pick among players. His ability to adapt to different situations and his high damage output make him a valuable asset in team fights. However, his reliance on his weapons and the coordination required with Alune means that he can be vulnerable if caught off guard.

Overall, Nightbringer Aphelios is a visually stunning skin that adds a new layer of depth to this already intriguing champion. With its dark and mysterious theme, it perfectly captures the essence of Aphelios' connection to the night. Whether you're a fan of his lore, his gameplay, or simply enjoy playing as a marksman, Nightbringer Aphelios is a skin that is sure to impress.

For more information about Aphelios and his various appearances, including Nightbringer Aphelios, be sure to check out the League of Legends website and official YouTube channel. Explore the depths of his lore, watch gameplay videos, and discover the many facets of this enigmatic champion.

Aphelios (Spirit Blossom Aphelios)

RP Cost: 1350 RP

Release Date: July 22, 2020

Aphelios, the enigmatic marksman of League of Legends, has received a stunning new skin as part of the Spirit Blossom event. Spirit Blossom Aphelios, with its intricate design and ethereal beauty, brings a fresh and captivating look to this mysterious champion. Let's delve into the story behind this skin and explore all the details that make it truly special.

The Story of Spirit Blossom Aphelios

In the mystical realm of Ionia, where spirits and mortals coexist, the Spirit Blossom festival is a time of celebration and remembrance. It is during this event that Aphelios, the Moonlit Lunari, takes on a new form, embracing the essence of the Spirit Blossom.

Spirit Blossom Aphelios embodies the harmony between the mortal and spirit realms. His appearance is adorned with delicate cherry blossoms, symbolizing renewal and the transient nature of life. The skin features a vibrant color palette, with shades of pink, purple, and gold, creating a visually striking contrast against Aphelios' dark and brooding nature.

The most notable aspect of Spirit Blossom Aphelios is his weapon, the Moonstone. In this skin, the Moonstone takes the form of a beautiful cherry blossom tree, with glowing petals that emit a soft, otherworldly light. Each of Aphelios' five weapons is intricately crafted, representing different stages of the cherry blossom's life cycle. From the budding phase to full bloom, the weapons evolve as Aphelios gains power, showcasing the beauty and transience of life.

Furthermore, Spirit Blossom Aphelios' abilities have been reimagined to match the theme of the skin. The ethereal effects and cherry blossom motifs add an extra layer of enchantment to his gameplay, making each ability feel more magical and captivating.

Aphelios: The Moonlit Lunari

Aphelios, the enigmatic champion introduced to League of Legends in December 2019, has quickly become a fan favorite. His unique playstyle, revolving around his five different weapons, presents a complex and strategic challenge for players.

Born under the moon's light, Aphelios is a member of the Lunari, an ancient religious order that worships the moon. He is accompanied by his sister, Alune, who guides him through the battlefield using her mystical powers. Aphelios is a silent warrior, communicating with Alune through a telepathic bond, as he is unable to speak.

Each of Aphelios' weapons represents a different aspect of his kit, allowing him to adapt to various situations. The Calibrum is a long-range rifle, providing him with precise and deadly attacks. Severum is a life-stealing weapon, granting him sustain and survivability. Gravitum is a crowd-control weapon, slowing and rooting enemies. Infernum is an area-of-effect weapon, dealing damage to multiple targets. Lastly, Crescendum is a chakram that excels in close combat, allowing Aphelios to unleash devastating melee attacks.

Aphelios' strengths lie in his versatility and adaptability. With his arsenal of weapons, he can adapt to different team compositions and playstyles. His ability to switch between weapons seamlessly gives him a unique advantage in team fights, allowing him to deal with various threats effectively.

However, Aphelios' complexity can also be seen as a weakness. Mastering his kit requires a deep understanding of each weapon's strengths and weaknesses, as well as careful management of his limited ammo. Additionally, Aphelios lacks mobility, making him vulnerable to champions with high mobility or gap-closing abilities.

In the lore of League of Legends, Aphelios and his sister Alune are on a quest to restore the Lunari order and seek revenge against the Solari, a rival religious order that worships the sun. Their story is intertwined with the larger narrative of Ionia, a land torn by conflict and spiritual turmoil.

As Aphelios continues to make his mark in the League of Legends universe, players can now experience his captivating story and unique gameplay through the Spirit Blossom Aphelios skin. Whether you're a fan of his mysterious nature or simply appreciate the beauty of the Spirit Blossom theme, this skin is a must-have for any Aphelios enthusiast.

For more information about Aphelios and his various appearances, including Spirit Blossom Aphelios, be sure to visit our page dedicated to this enigmatic champion. Watch videos, explore his abilities, and uncover the secrets of the Moonlit Lunari.
